column5: Going up to Lake Temagami on June 9th and was wondering what the forecast was for the black fly hatch or a mosquito report. Please advise.

Saw a whole mess of huge skeeters and blackflies loading up on meat tenderizer. They had a bumper sticker that said....."Like that Southern Meat". I think it is going to be a bad year. But imho when you have a bad bug year the fishing is awesome. Watch out for the bilingual skeeters .......they are the worst kind especially le belle province strain.
